import React from 'react' const Information = () => { return (
Contact us

01291 428013

Pitcherssportsbarandgrill@gmail.com
Keep Connected
    • {/*
    • */}
Opening times

  • Monday

    17:00 - 22:00

  • Tuesday

    10:00 - 23:00

  • Wednesday

    10:00 - 23:00

  • Thursday

    10:00 - 23:00

  • Friday

    10:00 - 02:00

  • Saturday

    10:00 - 02:00

  • Sunday

    11:00 - 22:00

Our facilities

  • Beer garden

  • Pool table

  • Darts

  • WIFI

  • BT Sports

  • Sky Sports

) } export default Information;
